description: The primary goals of DHMH for tobacco use are to reduce the prevalence of tobacco use in adults and youth; increase cessation efforts among adults, especially in high-risk populations; reduce initiation of and youth access to tobacco products, and address disparities in tobacco use. The metrics of key outcomes shown in this dataset directly support these primary goals. Please also see DHMH's Strategies A through C to achieving its tobacco use goals, each of which has a corresponding dataset. These data are provided each month by DHMH to StateStat and DoIT.

name: DHMH Report 20 (Tobacco Control): Key Outcomes
